title: Encroachment upon your liberties quote - effect

content.prompt: The views expressed in the excerpt contributed most directly to

choices.label: the addition of the Bill of Rights shortly after the Constitution was adopted
a series of rebellions and revolutions in France, Haiti, and Latin America
the elimination of the international slave trade
the creation of a strong central government

topic.text: 3.8: The Constitutional Convention and Debates over Ratification

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
